Package frogger.highscore

Class HighscoreController

java.lang.Object
frogger.highscore.HighscoreController
public class HighscoreController
extends java.lang.Object
The HighscoreController class provides utilities for determining a whether a new score is a new highscore, and uses a HighscoreLoader for reading and writing a list of Highscores to a file.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.List<Highscore> highscores
    A list storing the current highscores.
    private int levelNumber
    Specifies the level number of the Level the HighscoreController is instanced in.
    private java.beans.PropertyChangeSupport propertyChangeSupport
    Specifies a PropertyChangeSupport object for firing events related to property changes.

    • highscores

      A list storing the current highscores.

    • levelNumber

      private final int levelNumber

      Specifies a PropertyChangeSupport object for firing events related to property changes.

  • Constructor Details

    • HighscoreController

      public HighscoreController​(int levelNumber)
      Creates a HighscoreController.
      Parameters:
      levelNumber - Specifies the level number of the Level the instance is created in and determines which file the instance reads from and writes to.

  • Method Details

    • loadHighscores

      public void loadHighscores()
      Creates a new Thread which calls the HighscoreLoader to read a file and stores the scores in a list.

    • updateHighscores

      public void updateHighscores​(java.lang.String name, int score)
      Updates the current list of Highscores by inserting a new Highscore object and writes the updated list to a file. The list is sorted in descending order and only the top 3 Highscores will remain. Listeners of the list of highscores are updated that the list has changed.
      Parameters:
      name - Specifies the name of the person who achieved the new highscore.
      score - Specifies the score value of the new highscore.

    • isNewHighscore

      public boolean isNewHighscore​(int score)
      Checks whether a score value is greater than any score values stored in the current list of Highscores.
      Parameters:
      score - The potential new highscore value.
      Returns:
      • true - if score argument is a new highscore
      • false - if score argument is not a new highscore

    • getHighscoresFormattedDisplay

      public java.lang.String getHighscoresFormattedDisplay()
      Returns a String representation of the Highscores list to display
      Returns:
      A String object representing the current Highscores in the list formatted in the following way: "name : score"

    • addPropertyChangeListener

      public void addPropertyChangeListener​(java.lang.String propertyName, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener listener)
      Adds a Listener to a list of PropertyChagneListeners.
      Parameters:
      propertyName - A String object representing the name of the property that the Listener is listening to.
      listener - The Listener object.

    • removePropertyChangeListener

      public void removePropertyChangeListener​(java.beans.PropertyChangeListener listener)
      Removes a Listener from the list of PropertyChangeListeners.
      Parameters:
      listener - The Listener object.
